channel.title: Technology on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Technology on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer

item.title: The 10 things I learned from organizing my first meetup
item.description: Finally it happened. On 30 januari 2018 I have organized my first meetup for the Netherlands Camunda User Group. What an experience was this. So much has happened to make this event come to life and using this blog post I want to share my experiences in the hopes to inspire others!
